# timemoir

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of timemoir is to get memory used by a function "from the source"
(`/proc/<pid>/status`).

## Installation

You can install the development version of timemoir like so:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("nbc/timemoir")

```

## Example

```{r example}
library(timemoir)

my_function <- function() {
  Sys.sleep(2)
}

launch_function(my_function())

```
